DataElement.preferredName: Imaging Technology Session Most Recent Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any of a number of technologies that permits the visualization and acquisition of images into a physical or electronic record.:Time, period, or term devoted to some activity._The particular day, month and year an event will happen or has happened._Nearest to the present._Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).
